data.fullPhrase: Il y avait beaucoup de monde.
data.translation: There was a lot of people.
They used to go to the seaside.
You were calm.
Were you sleeping / did you sleep well?
I was drinking tea.

data.fullPhrase: On prenait un bain le dimanche.
data.translation: We used to take a bath on Sundays.
You used to walk a lot.
She used to read every day.
You were studying at home.
We were making a lot of noise.
In the past, people used to send letters.

data.phrase: Avant, tout le monde ____ une radio.
data.fullPhrase: Avant, tout le monde avait une radio.
data.translation: Everyone used to have a radio.

data.phrase: Avant, on ____ son linge à la main.
data.fullPhrase: Avant, on lavait son linge à la main.
data.translation: In the past, people used to wash their clothes by hand.

data.phrase: Avant, les Français ____ 45 h par semaine.
data.fullPhrase: Avant, les Français travaillaient 45 h par semaine.
data.translation: The French used to work 45 hours per week.

data.phrase: Avant, on ____ le lait à la ferme.
data.fullPhrase: Avant, on achetait le lait à la ferme.
data.translation: People used to buy milk from the farm.

data.fullPhrase: On ne prenait pas le train.
data.translation: We didn't take the train.
We/people used to drive cars.
People used to write letters.
They didn't have a television.
They used to read the newspaper.
Women used to take care of children.

data.fullPhrase: On ne voyageait pas à l'étranger.
data.translation: We/people didn't travel abroad.
We used to talk to our neighbours.

data.phrase: Les enfants n'____ pas à l'école le jeudi.
data.fullPhrase: Les enfants n'allaient pas à l'école le jeudi.
data.translation: Children didn't go to school on Thursdays.

data.phrase: Quand j'étais petite, je ____ à la poupée.
data.fullPhrase: Quand j'étais petite, je jouais à la poupée.
data.translation: When I was little, I used to play with dolls.
I used to read books.

data.phrase: J'____ mes parents à la maison.
data.fullPhrase: J'aidais mes parents à la maison.
data.translation: I used to help my parents at home.
I used to go to bed at 9 p.m.

data.phrase: Je ____ à mes grands-parents tous les week-ends.
data.fullPhrase: Je rendais visite à mes grands-parents tous les week-ends.
data.translation: I used to visit my grandparents every weekend.
They used to live in the countryside.
I used to cook with my grandmother.

data.fullPhrase: On se promenait dans le parc.
data.translation: We used to walk in the park.

data.fullPhrase: Je ne regardais jamais la télé.
data.translation: I never watched TV.

data.phrase: Il ____ quand les enfants sont sortis.
data.fullPhrase: Il pleuvait quand les enfants sont sortis.
data.translation: It was raining when the children went out.
We were shopping.
We were outside.

data.phrase: Ils ____ 10 ans quand on a pris cette photo.
data.fullPhrase: Ils avaient 10 ans quand on a pris cette photo.
data.translation: They were 10 years old when this photo was taken.
I was taking a shower.
It was cold.
I used to like music a lot.
I was opening a tin of sardines.
He used to ski.
I didn't understand.
He was sick.

data.fullPhrase: Je ne connaissais pas la ville.
data.translation: I didn't know the city.

data.phrase: Tu te souviens quand nous ____ dans le petit studio ?
data.fullPhrase: Tu te souviens quand nous habitions dans le petit studio ?
data.translation: Do you remember when we used to live in the small studio?
We were cooking.
We had a cat.
We used to drink coffee.

data.phrase: Tu ____ un téléphone quand tu étais petite ?
data.fullPhrase: Tu avais un téléphone quand tu étais petite ?
data.translation: Did you have a phone when you were little?
I didn't have a phone.

data.phrase: Les gens n'____ pas la même vie que maintenant.
data.fullPhrase: Les gens n'avaient pas la même vie que maintenant.
data.translation: People didn't have the same life as now.
We had fewer holidays.
Did you used to watch TV?

data.phrase: Mes parents n'____ pas la télévision.
data.fullPhrase: Mes parents n'avaient pas la télévision.
data.translation: My parents didn't have a television.
We used to listen to the radio.
I was little.

data.fullPhrase: Avant on lisait plus que maintenant.
data.translation: We used to read more than now.
I had many friends.
We had fun.
We used to play outside.
We used to run every day.
She didn't go out anymore.
Did you (use to) play football?
They used to talk all the time.
We used to hear conversations.

data.phrase: Je ____ que j'avais oublié quelque chose.
data.fullPhrase: Je savais que j'avais oublié quelque chose.
data.translation: I knew I had forgotten something.

data.phrase: Il ____ tout ce que je disais.
data.fullPhrase: Il écrivait tout ce que je disais.
data.translation: He wrote down everything I was saying.
People were talking loudly.

data.phrase: Quand j'étais jeune, je n'____ pas de voiture.
data.fullPhrase: Quand j'étais jeune, je n'avais pas de voiture.
data.translation: When I was young, I didn't have a car.

data.phrase: J'____ chaque année en vacances dans les Alpes.
data.fullPhrase: J'allais chaque année en vacances dans les Alpes.
data.translation: I used to go on holiday to the Alps every year.

data.phrase: Il ____ toujours au football avec ses copains.
data.fullPhrase: Il jouait toujours au football avec ses copains.
data.translation: He used to play football with his friends all the time.
I thought he was sick.

data.fullPhrase: Je croyais qu'elle avait des enfants.
data.translation: I thought she had children.

data.phrase: Je n'écoutais plus ce qu'elle me ____.
data.fullPhrase: Je n'écoutais plus ce qu'elle me disait.
data.translation: I didn't listen to what she was saying to me anymore.

data.fullPhrase: Elle ne se sentait pas bien.
data.translation: She didn't feel well.

data.phrase: Je ____ de la maison quand tu as appelé.
data.fullPhrase: Je sortais de la maison quand tu as appelé.
data.translation: I was leaving the house when you called.

data.phrase: Je ne ____ pas bien quand je ne portais pas de lunettes.
data.fullPhrase: Je ne voyais pas bien quand je ne portais pas de lunettes.
data.translation: I couldn't see well when I wasn't wearing glasses.
We couldn't see anything.
She couldn't hear.
I wanted to help her.

data.fullPhrase: Ma sœur ne voulait pas partir.
data.translation: My sister didn't want to leave.
We wanted to go to Amsterdam.

data.fullPhrase: J'ai fait ce que tu voulais.
data.translation: I did what you wanted.

data.phrase: Je ____ beaucoup mieux quand j'étais enfant.
data.fullPhrase: Je dormais beaucoup mieux quand j'étais enfant.
data.translation: I used to sleep much better when I was a child.

data.phrase: Il ne t'a pas dit que je ____.
data.fullPhrase: Il ne t'a pas dit que je venais.
data.translation: He didn't tell you that I was coming.
I couldn't stay.

data.phrase: Il ____ me rappeler, mais il a oublié.
data.fullPhrase: Il devait me rappeler, mais il a oublié.
data.translation: He was supposed to call me back, but he forgot.

data.phrase: Je ____ rester à la maison avec mon petit frère.
data.fullPhrase: Je devais rester à la maison avec mon petit frère.
data.translation: I had to stay home with my little brother.

data.phrase: Ils ____ rester éveillés toute la nuit.
data.fullPhrase: Ils pouvaient rester éveillés toute la nuit.
data.translation: They could stay awake all night.
They had to come back early.
We were driving our car.
They thought they could do it.

data.fullPhrase: Ils servaient des plats trop chauds.
data.translation: They were serving dishes that were too hot.

data.fullPhrase: Tu finissais toujours un peu tard.
data.translation: You always finished a bit late.
I continued my way.
They were dancing all night.

data.fullPhrase: Je prenais les transports en commun.
data.translation: I used to take public transport.
We wanted to change our habits.
They came back several times.

data.phrase: Ils ____ des romans chaque soir avant de dormir.
data.fullPhrase: Ils lisaient des romans chaque soir avant de dormir.
data.translation: They used to read novels every night before sleeping.

data.phrase: Tu ____ du sucre dans ton café.
data.fullPhrase: Tu mettais du sucre dans ton café.
data.translation: You used to put sugar in your coffee.

data.fullPhrase: Vous pouviez faire beaucoup de choses.
data.translation: You could do a lot of things.

data.fullPhrase: Je ne pouvais pas y aller.
data.translation: I couldn't go there.
You could hear the teacher well.

data.fullPhrase: On voulait faire plus d'activités sportives.
data.translation: We wanted to do more sports activities.

data.phrase: Je ____ cet endroit pour la première fois.
data.fullPhrase: Je voyais cet endroit pour la première fois.
data.translation: I saw this place for the first time.

data.fullPhrase: Tu voulais le faire pour moi ?
data.translation: Did you want to do this for me?
You rarely came to see us.
